chapter.title: Additional Tools and Useful How To Examples
chapter.para: Additional tools for and information on how to use database forms is available in various locations including our wiki, how-tos for the bookstore, and in the dbforms/contrib directory

para.emphasis: Any techniques you have for our bookstore How-To examples or Tools you want to contribute can be done through our mailing list.

sect1.title: Wiki
sect1.para: Please see and contribute your helpful solutions/suggestions to the DbForm's Wiki

sect1.title: Changing Select Box Value From Another Select Box
sect1.para: An example to show how to change the values shown in a second select box based on the value chosen by a user in the first select box.
See the HowTos if you have the bookstore example installed, or view it under dbforms/examples/bookstore/howto/index.html

sect1.title: Tabbed Selector
sect1.para: An example to show how to "break up" a page using a tabSelector to allow for the input of one form over several pages
See the HowTos if you have the bookstore example installed, or view it under dbforms/examples/bookstore/howto/index.html

sect1.title: Printing a JasperReport
sect1.para: Shows how to to print a JasperReport from dbforms for either the whole list or a single row of data using <db:goto> tag
See the HowTos if you have the bookstore example installed, or view it under dbforms/examples/bookstore/howto/index.html

sect1.title: Create an Excel Worksheet
sect1.para: Shows how to to create an Excel worksheet report with Dbforms using <db:goto> tag
See the HowTos if you have the bookstore example installed, or view it under dbforms/examples/bookstore/howto/index.html

sect1.title: Use the Custom Formatter
sect1.para: How to use the Custom Formatter
See the HowTos if you have the bookstore example installed, or view it under dbforms/examples/bookstore/howto/index.html

sect1.title: Tool to Merge dbforms-config.xml Files.
sect1.para: There is an update-config ant task and other resources to assist in overlaying a newly generated dbforms-config.xml file to add needed attributes / elements or keep keep hand coded changes you want in your config.
It can be found in the /dbforms/contrib/mark_dimon directory
